word:
THERE WERE OTHER PROBLEMS THAT INDICATE 
     SHE WAS NOT READY TO TAKE ON THE 
     RESPONSIBILITIES OF MARRIED LIFE, EITHER BY 
     TEMPERAMENT OR BY TRAINING. ELLEN WHITE 
     ASKS SOME QUESTIONS OF ROLF THAT SHOULD 
     BE ANSWERED BY EVERY YOUNG MAN WHO 
     PLANS FOR MARRIAGE. 
                                                                           21
